metadata.description: Official plugin marketplace for the Trellis framework - tools for building software with AI assistance

plugins.name: trellis-core
plugins.description: Core setup - /trellis initializes project structure (TECH_SPECS.md, README.md, CHANGELOG.md, .trellis/, .claude/)

plugins.name: trellis-changelog
plugins.description: Changelog management - automatic session tracking via hooks, /done transfers to main changelog, compaction at 400 lines

plugins.name: trellis-build
plugins.description: Build runner - executes builds/tests, summarizes stack traces, reports logs via hooks

plugins.name: trellis-vibe-check
plugins.description: Code quality - /vibe-check scans for redundant code, race conditions, and vibe coding pitfalls

plugins.name: trellis-notes
plugins.description: Notes enrichment - /notes reads .trellis/NOTES.md and adds context, relevant files, and details

plugins.name: trellis-arch
plugins.description: Architecture docs - /arch generates ARCHITECTURE.md with Mermaid diagrams

plugins.name: trellis-planning
plugins.description: Planning phase tools - /plan for feature planning, /research for technology exploration, /spec for generating TECH_SPECS.md

plugins.name: trellis-review
plugins.description: Review phase tools - /review for code review with Trellis principles, /kaizen for continuous improvement retrospectives

plugins.name: trellis-context
plugins.description: Context management tools - /context-check to evaluate and manage working context lifecycle
